title: Feel at home your first night! Fall in love with your 2 BR / 2 BA!
posting_body: ['Polo Club Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '100 Ashley Creek Cir', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities
